body:
I have a few random questions that (a new developer) is likely to hit.

 - What is the variable / import to get the spack base directory (where it's installed)
 - Where do I get the prefix for where ultimately packages get installed (e.g., the folder spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16.04-x86_64)
 - Where would I store a template file that goes into a command?
 - What's the easiest way to set up an environment to test a command (other than trying to reverse engineer the entrypoint) - the python debugger? I sort of want to be in ipython, etc.
 - How do I generate a dependency graph to test /play with

That's all for now.
title: Random Questions
